Detailed Description

Implements the library interface for the ABB Test Board.

unsigned int *  data,
const unsigned int  count,
const bool  inc = true
)  [inline, virtual]
 

Read multiple values from the board address space.

Parameters:
address Address in the board.
data An array where to read values into.
count Number of values to read from the board's address space, in dwords.
inc Increment the address on the FPGA side (default: true).
Exceptions:
mprace::Exception On error.

Reimplemented from mprace::Board.

void ABB::readDMA (  const unsigned int  address,
DMABuffer &  buf,
const unsigned int  count,
const unsigned int  offset = 0,
const bool  inc = true,
const bool  lock = true
)  [virtual]
 

Read multiple values from the board address space to a DMA Buffer.

Parameters:
address Address in the board.
data An array where to read values into.
count Number of values to read from the board's address space, in dwords.
offset Offset in the DMA buffer, in dwords (default = 0).
inc Increment the address on the FPGA side (default: true).
lock Lock until the write finishes (default: true)
Exceptions:
mprace::Exception On error.

Reimplemented from mprace::Board.
